definition[0]: misty weather is weather with a lot of mist
definition[1]: if your eyes are misty, they are full of tears, especially because you are remembering a time in the past
example[1]: He paused, his eyes growing misty.
example[2]: Whenever Maria sees a picture of her mother, she gets misty-eyed.
example[3]: Without my glasses everything is just a misty blur.
